examples: heavy metal disks the size of hockey pucks
synonyms: round; coin "the sun was a huge scarlet disc"

definitions.definition: an information storage device for a computer in the shape of a round flat plate that can be rotated to give access to all parts of the surface. The data may be stored either magnetically (in a magnetic disk ) or optically (in an optical disk such as a CD-ROM).
examples: noun: magnetic disk; plural noun: magnetic disks; noun: optical disk; plural noun: optical disks
synonyms: floppy; Morehard disk; zip disk; CD

definitions.definition: one of the suits in some tarot packs, corresponding to coins in others.
a shape or surface that is round and flat in appearance.
examples: the smudged yellow disk of the moon

definitions.definition: a roundish, flattened part in an animal or plant, in particular.
a layer of cartilage separating adjacent vertebrae in the spine.
examples: noun: intervertebral disc; plural noun: intervertebral discs

definitions.definition: (in a composite flower head of the daisy family) a close-packed cluster of disk florets in the center, forming the yellow part of the flower head.
cultivate (a field) with a disk harrow.
